subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Luge Racing
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: The family of the Georgian luge athlete who died in a training crash on the Olympic track hours before the Vancouver Games opened last month will receive an undisclosed insurance settlement.
snippet: The family of the Georgian luge athlete who died in a training crash on the Olympic track hours before the Vancouver Games opened last month will receive an undisclosed insurance settlement.
